component.name: Cubiomes Viewer
component.summary: Minecraft seed finder and map viewer

description.p: Cubiomes Viewer offers highly customizable seed-finding utilities and a map viewer for the biome and structure generation of Minecraft Java Edition for the main releases up to 1.20.

ul.li: Added progress indication via app icon

description.p: This release adds a way to find locations in a given seed, as well as a biome sample filter that can check biome proportions.
All scaled coordinates have been changed to use block coordinates instead. Scaled biome filters and iterators now have a scaling option.

ul.li: Added Locations tab to look for position in the current seed
Added filter for Biome Samples to check biome proportions
Added outline display for the area of selected conditions
Added headless mode to search seeds without a GUI using --nogui
Moved scaling of Biome filters to a filter option
Moved step size of Iterators to a filter option
Moved Nether and End biome filters to the Biome category
Enabled Voronoi biome filters (use only when necessary)
Removed Triggers tab, since the Locations tab includes its functionality
